source: Original content based on Azure documentation

questions.title: AZURE_VM_001
questions.question: Which Azure VM series is optimized for memory-intensive workloads like SAP HANA?
questions.explanation: E-series VMs are optimized for memory-intensive applications with high memory-to-CPU ratio.

questions.title: AZURE_STORAGE_001
questions.question: Which Azure storage redundancy option replicates data across availability zones in the same region?
questions.explanation: ZRS replicates data synchronously across three availability zones in the primary region.

questions.title: AZURE_NETWORK_001
questions.question: You need to connect two VNets in different regions. What should you use?
questions.explanation: Global VNet Peering connects VNets across different Azure regions with low latency.

questions.title: AZURE_IDENTITY_001
questions.question: Which Azure AD feature allows automatic password reset for users?
questions.explanation: SSPR enables users to reset their passwords without helpdesk intervention.

questions.title: AZURE_MONITORING_001
questions.question: Which Azure service collects metrics and logs from Azure resources?
questions.explanation: Azure Monitor is the comprehensive monitoring service that collects metrics and logs.

questions.title: AZURE_BACKUP_001
questions.question: What is the maximum retention period for Azure VM backups?
questions.explanation: Azure Backup supports retention up to 9999 days (approximately 27 years).

questions.title: AZURE_AKS_001
questions.question: Which Azure service provides managed Kubernetes clusters?
questions.explanation: AKS is a fully managed Kubernetes service that simplifies deployment and management.

questions.title: AZURE_APPSERVICE_001
questions.question: Which App Service plan tier supports auto-scaling?
questions.explanation: Auto-scaling is available in Standard, Premium, and Isolated tiers.

questions.title: AZURE_SECURITY_001
questions.question: Which Azure service provides DDoS protection for public IP addresses?
questions.explanation: Azure DDoS Protection provides always-on monitoring and automatic attack mitigation.

questions.title: AZURE_LOADBALANCER_001
questions.question: Which load balancer supports SSL offloading and URL-based routing?
questions.explanation: Application Gateway is a Layer 7 load balancer with SSL/TLS termination and path-based routing.

questions.title: AZURE_RBAC_001
questions.question: At what scope can you assign Azure RBAC roles? (Choose THREE)
questions.explanation: RBAC can be assigned at management group, subscription, resource group, and individual resource level.

questions.title: AZURE_VNET_001
questions.question: Which Azure networking feature connects on-premises networks to Azure via private connection?
questions.explanation: ExpressRoute provides private, dedicated connection between on-premises and Azure datacenters.

questions.title: AZURE_DISK_001
questions.question: Which Azure disk type provides the highest IOPS for production workloads?
questions.explanation: Ultra Disk provides sub-millisecond latency and up to 160,000 IOPS for demanding workloads.

questions.title: AZURE_POLICY_001
questions.question: Which Azure service enforces organizational standards and assesses compliance?
questions.explanation: Azure Policy creates, assigns, and manages policies to enforce rules and compliance.

questions.title: AZURE_TAGS_001
questions.question: What is the maximum number of tags you can apply to an Azure resource?
questions.explanation: Each Azure resource supports up to 50 tags for organization and cost tracking.
